QuestData.Title: Maximum Security Breakout
QuestData.Description: Harbinger Skyriss is the heart of the problem in the Arcatraz.$B$BHe corrupted Warden Mellichar and made him release many of the prisoners. It is only a matter of time before the Harbinger himself is let loose.$B$B$n, you cannot let a servant of the Old Gods live!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Be careful, he is very powerful.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal has asked you to slay Harbinger Skyriss in the Arcatraz of Tempest Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. Your actions this day have prevented countless tragedies.
